description: Ministry of Urban Development Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Rambuke Ela, Akurana D/S Division and in Girakaduwa and Udathalawinna, Pathadumbara D/S Division, Kandy District for the Constructions under Kandy North - Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project and in Nivithigala, Nivithigala D/S Division, Ratnapura District for the constructions under Nivithigala Water Supply Scheme
